KOUSA: To our friends returning from the expedition to the stormy planet: We welcome you home to <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> with great pleasure!
2
1
KOUSA: I have heard tell of the terrible storms you have faced on your expeditions to the stormy planet, and could not help but wonder what I could do to protect you better from these conditions..
3
2
KOUSA: To that end, I am proud to present to you the solution we have engineered, in collaboration with our friends from the <color=orange>Sunless City;</color> the storm shelter!
4
3
KOUSA: The storm shelter is a device that generates a gravity field designed to hold Nomai in place, perfect for protecting Nomai in zero-gravity.
5 3
KOUSA: Thanks to the <color=orange>Sunless City's</color> contributions, the device is able to autonomously power itself when islands are launched into orbit, and even deactivates on its own afterwards to conserve power.
6 5
KOUSA: I humbly invite you to visit the <color=lightblue>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> soon, so that I may share this invention with you, and send it with you on your next expedition!
7 6
PLUME: How incredible, Kousa! I must thank our friends from the <color=orange>Sunless City</color> when we next set off for our expedition to the stormy planet together.
8 7
PLUME: And of course, you have my deepest gratitude for your hard work, Kousa. I look forward to visiting the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> to learn more about the storm shelters soon!
